text: Antonio Lamela (December 1, 1926 - April 1, 2017) was a Spanish architect. He was born and raised in Madrid. His most well known projects are Santiago Bernabéu Stadium, the Adolfo Suárez, Madrid–Barajas Airport and the Torres de Colón. Lamela died on April 1, 2017 in Madrid at the age of 90. ==References== ==Other websites== * Official website of Estudio Lamela Arquitectos * Conferencia A. title: Antonio Lamela
